Translations.Text: Indeed Allah will admit those who have faith and do righteous deeds into gardens with streams running in them, adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their dress therein will be silk
They shall be guided to the purest speech, and guided to the path of the All-laudable

Indeed those who are faithless and who bar from the way of Allah and the Sacred Mosque, which We have assigned for all the people, the native and the visitor being equal therein â€”whoever seeks to commit therein sacrilege with the intent of wrongdoing, We shall make him taste a painful punishment
